channel.title: Lyric "Ripper"?
channel.description:
Basically, Im looking for a program that will rip lyrics from songs, leaving just the instrumentals. I can't really find anything, and was wondering if anyone knew of anything good to use to rip the lyrics out of songs.
Thanks =]

item.title: Lyric "Ripper"?
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Hmm okays, that’s confusing:P But thanks for replying. I’ll do some research and try to find a program that allows me to clone the song/turn the shit down:P

Read full topic

item.title: Lyric "Ripper"?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The ony way this us possible is if the intruments and such are on a different spectrum (cant think of the real term) oherwise you can clone the song, flip it, turn down the highs and lows . It wont get rid of the voice completely but it will quiet it.

Read full topic
